mapper.select:
select
,c_le_name,c_le_id,a_id,a_name FROM customer_t INNER JOIN customer_level ON c_cl_id=c_le_id INNER JOIN area_t ON c_a_id=a_id
and c_id like CONCAT('%',#{cId},'%') and c_name like CONCAT('%',#{cName},'%') and c_a_id like CONCAT('%',#{cAId},'%') and c_contact_name like CONCAT('%',#{cContactName},'%')
and c_cl_id like CONCAT('%',#{cClId},'%')
limit #{from},#{pageSize}

select COUNT(1) FROM customer_t INNER JOIN customer_level ON c_cl_id=c_le_id INNER JOIN area_t ON c_a_id=a_id
and c_id like CONCAT('%',#{cId},'%') and c_name like CONCAT('%',#{cName},'%') and c_a_id like CONCAT('%',#{cAId},'%') and c_contact_name like CONCAT('%',#{cContactName},'%')
and c_cl_id like CONCAT('%',#{cClId},'%')
mapper.sql: c_id, c_name, c_a_id, c_contact_name, c_cl_id, c_credit_line, c_satisfaction, c_address, c_telephone, c_fax, c_postcode, c_url, c_business_license, c_reg_money, c_deposit_bank, c_bank_account, c_state_taxes_number, c_local_taxes_number, c_corporation, c_yearly_turnover
mapper.insert: insert into customer_t (c_id, c_name, c_a_id, c_contact_name, c_cl_id, c_credit_line, c_satisfaction, c_address, c_telephone, c_fax, c_postcode, c_url, c_business_license, c_reg_money, c_deposit_bank, c_bank_account, c_state_taxes_number, c_local_taxes_number, c_corporation, c_yearly_turnover) values (#{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cAId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cContactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cClId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cCreditLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cSatisfaction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cBusinessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cRegMoney,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{cDepositBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cStateTaxesNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cLocalTaxesNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cCorporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cYearlyTurnover,jdbcType=BIGINT})

mapper.update:
update customer_t
c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_a_id = #{cAId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_contact_name = #{cContactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_cl_id = #{cClId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
c_credit_line = #{cCreditLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_satisfaction = #{cSatisfaction,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_address = #{cAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_telephone = #{cTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_fax = #{cFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_postcode = #{cPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_url = #{cUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_business_license = #{cBusinessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_reg_money = #{cRegMoney,jdbcType=BIGINT},
c_deposit_bank = #{cDepositBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_bank_account = #{cBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_state_taxes_number = #{cStateTaxesNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_local_taxes_number = #{cLocalTaxesNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_corporation = #{cCorporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
c_yearly_turnover = #{cYearlyTurnover,jdbcType=BIGINT},
where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update customer_t set c_name = #{cName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_a_id = #{cAId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_contact_name = #{cContactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_cl_id = #{cClId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, c_credit_line = #{cCreditLine,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_satisfaction = #{cSatisfaction,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_address = #{cAddress,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_telephone = #{cTelephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_fax = #{cFax,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_postcode = #{cPostcode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_url = #{cUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_business_license = #{cBusinessLicense,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_reg_money = #{cRegMoney,jdbcType=BIGINT}, c_deposit_bank = #{cDepositBank,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_bank_account = #{cBankAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_state_taxes_number = #{cStateTaxesNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_local_taxes_number = #{cLocalTaxesNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_corporation = #{cCorporation,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, c_yearly_turnover = #{cYearlyTurnover,jdbcType=BIGINT} where c_id = #{cId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
